definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="random">random</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:random</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Sets a random number between 1 and 100.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="return_logic"><value name="return"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">If the value is at or below a specific number the bonemal script will run.</comment><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:random</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">45</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Default saplings have a 45% chance of growing with bonemeal.</comment></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
